group_1.textRight: Alriiight! New Year's sales!@I'm buyin' a lucky bag!

group_1.textLeft: Think they have any game lucky bags?
There is a limit to your spending money,@so you should think before you use it all...

group_1.textRight: S'all good!@I got my New Year's gift too!

group_1.textLeft: There's a limit to that as well, you know...?

group_1.textRight: If you're on about money, you don't gotta worry.@No matter what, our target today is...

group_1.textCenter: Inventory clearance sale! Completely@random special lucky bags here...!
One bag, 1,000 yen! One per person!

group_1.textRight: And the stuff inside's worth up to 50,000 yen!
Heehee, I'm gettin' fired up...! Let's try@our luck again this year 'n buy 'em!
...He said the items are totally random.@It's a gamble~...

group_1.textLeft: That's right, there is no guarantee@to get something you even want...

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*...
But it's so interesting!!@I'm gonna go buy one toooo!
Hikaru's curious now too!@Yuna, let's buy some too!

group_1.textLeft: ...If one is all it takes to test my luck...@Well, I suppose it's fine...

group_1.textRight: Alright now, what we got in...here.
...Mm, the hell's this...?@Mini-Bunni...? This some kinda character?

group_1.textLeft: Cute, though...pfft, to think@Big Sis would pull that...hehe...

group_1.textRight: Shit—! There's still more in here,@so I'm pushin' my luck...
Wait— woah, this's a book, ain't it...@This thing's why the bag felt so damn heavy...

group_1.textLeft: A book on the history and folklore@of Futatsugi City. Not bad.

group_1.textRight: Sure is...@To toss in the bonfire, maybe...

group_1.textLeft: Ugh...is mine gonna be a dud too...@This sweater's color is weird...[chara:102301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102301:cheek_0][chara:102301:motion_300][chara:102301:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:102301:lipSynch_1]hm?
Ah—AAaaAAHH!!@The game I was tempted to buy's in here!

group_1.textRight: Haah?! And Sis and Horse?!

group_1.textLeft: A wearable blanket in mine.@The rest's all crap, but I'm satisfied!
There was a diary in mine.@*Chuckle* Just what I needed...

group_1.textRight: Why's Juri the Great the only one screwed@out of anythin' useful...
Alright, Lil' Sis!@Trade the book for your game!

group_1.textLeft: That's a no~@You picked that yourself, didn't you, Sis?

group_1.textCenter: No fighting this early into the new year.
If Tamaki heard this, I'm sure she would be@straining a laugh...

group_1.textRight: Ah? The hell you bringin' her up for?

group_1.textCenter: I'm going to keep a diary until the day@we meet again...
...to tell her the things we do to pass every day.
Because it's thanks to her that we get to live now...

group_1.textRight: ...Truce?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, when I'm done playing this game@I'll lend it to you.

group_1.textRight: Now that you've made up,@onward to the next place?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's pay our first visit to the shrine this year...
